class.name: rviz_attitude_plugin/Attitude
class.description:
Displays attitude/orientation data from quaternions with artificial horizon, heading indicator, and Euler angle readouts. Supports multiple Euler conventions and displays in degrees or radians.
Supported message types: - geometry_msgs/QuaternionStamped - geometry_msgs/PoseStamped - geometry_msgs/PoseWithCovarianceStamped - sensor_msgs/Imu - nav_msgs/Odometry
